Develop an underwater robot that can withstand extreme temperatures and pressures to explore deep sea environments.
Create a portable underwater drone that can be deployed from surface vessels to conduct surveys and collect samples in areas that are difficult or impossible for humans to reach.
Develop a new type of underwater camera that uses artificial intelligence to identify and track marine species, providing real-time data to scientists and conservationists.
Design a specialized underwater vehicle that can withstand extreme conditions and perform complex tasks such as oil spill cleanup or search and rescue operations.
Create a mobile app that allows users to contribute to ocean research by reporting sightings of marine animals and sharing their observations with scientific communities around the world.
